mapper.update: update evaluate set record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluate_time = #{evaluateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluate_type = #{evaluateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluate_content = #{evaluateContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluate_person = #{evaluatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluate_person_relationship = #{evaluatePersonRelationship,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, evaluate_name = #{evaluateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where evaluate_id = #{evaluateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select evaluate_id, record_id, evaluate_time, evaluate_type, evaluate_content, evaluate_person, evaluate_person_relationship, evaluate_name from evaluate where evaluate_id = #{evaluateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select evaluate_id, record_id, evaluate_time, evaluate_type, evaluate_content, evaluate_person, evaluate_person_relationship, evaluate_name from evaluate
